Acrid.description: Acrid is a melee-range hybrid who uses powerful poisons to melt tanky enemies.
Acrid.name: Acrid

skills.name: Poison
skills.Description:
Poisonous
 attacks apply a powerful damage-over-time.
skills.Notes:
Poison ticks 3 times per second for 10 seconds.
Poison deals 1% of the victim's maximum health per second (0.33% per tick) or an amount per second equivalent to Acrid's damage stat, whichever deals more damage. Poison is capped at 50 times Acrid's Damage per second.
Poison damage is affected by armor and has the nonlethal tag.
Poison is a Damage over Time effect, meaning it cannot Proc.

skills.name: Blight
skills.Description: Attacks that apply Poison apply stacking Blight instead, dealing 60% damage per second.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Acrid: Easy Prey Challenge. (As Acrid, land the killing blow on 50 total enemies that have 1 hit point left.)
Blight ticks 3 times per second for 5 seconds.
Blight deals 20% of Acrid's damage stat per tick, or 60% damage per second. Each stack of Blight increases the damage of each tick rather than adding more ticks.

skills.name: Vicious Wounds
skills.Description:
Maul an enemy for 200% damage. Every 3rd hit is 
Regenerative
 and deals 400% damage.

skills.name: Neurotoxin
skills.Description:
Poisonous
. Spit toxic bile for 240% damage.

skills.name: Ravenous Bite
skills.Description:
Poisonous
. 
Slayer
. 
Regenerative
. Bite an enemy for 310% damage.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Acrid: Bad Medicine Challenge. (As Acrid, land the final blow on a Scavenger.)
For every 1% of health the enemy is missing, the damage multiplier is increased by 2%.

skills.name: Caustic Leap
skills.Description:
Poisonous
. 
Stunning
. Leap in the air, dealing 320% damage. Leave acid that deals 25% damage.
skills.Notes: Has 2 base charges

skills.name: Frenzied Leap
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Leap in the air, dealing 550% damage. Reduce the cooldown by 2s for every enemy hit.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Acrid: Pandemic Challenge. (As Acrid, inflict Poison 1000 total times.)
Has 2 base charges

skills.name: Epidemic
skills.Description:
Poisonous
. Release a deadly disease that deals 100% damage. The disease spreads to up to 20 targets.
skills.Notes: If Epidemic hits a surface it will bounce to any nearby Monsters.

Artificer.description: The Artificer is a high burst damage survivor who excels in fighting large groups and bosses alike.
Artificer.name: Artificer

skills.name: ENV Suit
skills.Description: Holding the Jump key causes the Artificer to hover in the air.

skills.name: Flame Bolt
skills.Description: Fire a bolt for 220% damage that ignites enemies. Hold up to 4.
skills.Notes:
Burns 8 ticks for 25% damage each
2m blast radius

skills.name: Plasma Bolt
skills.Description: Fire a bolt for 220% damage that explodes in a small area. Hold up to 4.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Artificer: Massacre Challenge. (As Artificer, perform a multikill of 20 enemies.)
6m blast radius

skills.name: Charged Nano-Bomb
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Charge up a exploding nano-bomb that deals 400%-2000% damage.
skills.Notes:
Can sprint while charging
The damage will increase during the initial animation, causing the minimum damage to be 600% (increased with Attack Speed)
Takes 2s to fully charge with an Attack Speed of 1.
The orb fires bolts at nearby enemies on the fly, dealing 1/5th of it's damage or 400% with a full charge.
14m blast radius
Orb's trajectory arcs downwards, similar to MUL-T's old scrap launcher

skills.name: Cast Nano-Spear
skills.Description:
Freezing
. Charge up a piercing nano-spear that deals 400%-1200% damage.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Artificer: Chunked! Challenge. (As Artificer, fully defeat the teleporter boss in a one-second burst of damage.)
Frozen enemies with 30% or less health are instantly killed.
Can't freeze bosses.
Can burn while frozen.

skills.name: Snapfreeze
skills.Description:
Freezing
. Create a barrier that hurts enemies for 100% damage.
skills.Notes:
Frozen enemies with 30% or less health are instantly killed.
Can't freeze bosses.
Can burn while frozen.
2.5m AoE per pillar.
Pillars are roughly 5m in height.

skills.name: Flamethrower
skills.Description: Burn all enemies in front of you for 1700% damage.
skills.Notes:
Pierces through enemies
Each tick has a 50% chance to ignite all enemies it hits. This chance is affected by Luck.
If crit procs, all hits will crit
Has a 0.6 second windup duration. This is the only part of the skill that scales with Attack Speed.
Takes 3s to fire and another 5s to cooldown.
Deals damage 22 times. Each hit deals roughly 95% damage, has a Proc Coefficient of 1 and half of them will set the target on fire. That means Flamethrower deals a tremendous 2095% damage, plus 2200% in burn to anything in front.
The fire beam has a max reach of 21m.
Damage Tick-rate does not scale with attack speed.

skills.name: Ion Surge
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Burst into the sky, dealing 800% damage.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Artificer: Orbital Bombardment Challenge. (As Artificer, kill 15 enemies before touching the ground.)
Launch velocity is increased with additional movement speed
Can be used while airborne, allowing you to fly perpetually.

Bandit.description: The Bandit is a high-skill combo character that can dish out devastating backstabs while weaving in and out of stealth.
Bandit.name: Bandit

skills.name: Backstab
skills.Description: All attacks from behind are Critical Strikes.

skills.name: Burst
skills.Description: Fire a shotgun burst for 5x100% damage. Can hold up to 4 shells.

skills.name: Blast
skills.Description: Fire a rifle blast for 330% damage. Can hold up to 4 bullets.
skills.Notes: Unlocked via the Bandit: Classic Man Challenge. (As Bandit, successfully use 'Lights Out' to reset your cooldowns 15 times in a row.)

skills.name: Serrated Dagger
skills.Description:
Lunge and slash for 360% damage. Critical Strikes also cause 
hemorrhaging
.
skills.Notes: Doesn't interrupt sprinting.

skills.name: Serrated Shiv
skills.Description:
Throw a hidden blade for 240% damage. Critical Strikes also cause 
hemorrhaging
.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Bandit: Sadist Challenge. (As Bandit, kill a monster with 20 stacks of Hemorrhage.)
Doesn't interrupt sprinting.

skills.name: Smoke Bomb
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Deal 200% damage, become invisible, then deal 200% damage again.
skills.Notes:
Applies upward momentum to Bandit at the start and end of the ability's duration when activated in the air.
Provides a small speed boost for the duration of the ability.
Using any Skill during the ability will instantly make Bandit exit invisibility. Using an equipment will not.

skills.name: Lights Out
skills.Description:
Slayer
. Fire a revolver shot for 600% damage. Kills reset all your cooldowns.

skills.name: Desperado
skills.Description:
Slayer
. Fire a revolver shot for 600% damage. Kills grant stacking tokens for 10% more Desparado damage.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Bandit: B&E Challenge. (As Bandit, kill the final boss with 'Lights Out'.)
All tokens are lost upon advancing to next stage.

Captain.description: The Captain is a unique survivor that can control the battlefield with utility and damage - with help from the UES Safe Travels.
Captain.name: Captain

skills.name: Defensive Microbots
skills.Description: Passively gain Microbots that shoot down nearby enemy projectiles. Drones are also given Microbots.
skills.Notes:
Grants a free copy of the 
Defensive Microbots
 legendary item, and appears on the item bar accordingly. See the item page for details about the item itself.
The Captain will permanently lose his Defensive Microbots if it's discarded using a Mili-Tech Printer, Scrapper, or Shrine of Order.
Newly allied Drones and Turrets will still be given Defensive Microbots, regardless of if the Captain discards his own.
If the player spawns as Captain with Artifact of Metamorphosis active, the Defensive Microbots will continue to persist for the rest of the run.

skills.name: Vulcan Shotgun
skills.Description: Fire a blast of pellets that deal 8x120% damage. Charging the attack narrows the spread.
skills.Notes:
Time between shots is 1 second at base attack speed
Charge time is 1.2 seconds at base attack speed
Damage falloff starts at 25m and ends at 60m, falling to approximately 50% of the bullet's damage.
If the attack is a crit, all 8 pellets will crit
Confers a considerable amount of knockback to lighter enemies on impact: fully-charged shots can launch Lesser Wisps great distances.

skills.name: Power Tazer
skills.Description:
Shocking
. Fire a fast tazer that deals 100% damage. Travels farther if bounced.
skills.Notes:
Guaranteed stun/interrupt on any non-Boss enemy.
Produces a 2m AoE.
Shock wears off after 5 seconds if not broken by damage.

skills.name: Orbital Probe
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Request up to 3 Orbital Probes from the UES Safe Travels. Each probe deals 1000% damage.
skills.Notes:
Has three 'charges' when activated, and puts you into a targeting mode similar to Engineer's Thermal Harpoons. Cooldown only starts when all charges are spent.
Has a short delay before impact. Adjust for enemy movements accordingly.

skills.name: OGM-72 'DIABLO' Strike
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Request a kinetic strike from the UES Safe Travels. After 20 seconds, it deals 40,000% damage to ALL characters.
skills.Notes: Unlocked via the Captain: Smushed Challenge. (As Captain, kill the final boss using a Supply Beacon)

skills.name: Orbital Supply Beacon
skills.Description: Request a permanent Supply Beacon. Can only be requested twice per stage.
skills.Notes:
Activating this skill puts you into a targeting mode which previews where the beacon will land. The primary skill button calls in the first beacon, and the secondary skill button calls in the second beacon. Once both have been called in, the skill icon will turn into a red NO ENTRY sign for the rest of the stage.
Beacons take a few moments to arrive and fully deploy before their effect activates.
Select Beacon functions via Loadout. Appearance will vary by function.
If a beacon succesfully lands on an enemy it does 2000% damage each.
Beacon targeting can be cancelled by Sprinting.
The AoE of all applicable beacons is about 9m, as displayed by the drop guide.

skills.name: Beacon: Healing
skills.Description: Heal all nearby allies for 10% of their maximum health every second.
skills.Notes: When in the area of multiple beacons at once, the effects will stack.

skills.name: Beacon: Shocking
skills.Description: Periodically Shock all nearby enemies, immobilizing them.
skills.Notes: Fires every 3 seconds, stun-locking susceptible enemies until attacked.

skills.name: Beacon: Resupply
skills.Description: Recharge Equipment on use.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Captain: Wanderlust Challenge. (As Captain, visit 10 different environments in a single run.)
The beacon can be used up to three times.

skills.name: Beacon: Hacking
skills.Description: Hack all nearby purchasables to a cost of $0 over time.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Captain: Worth Every Penny Challenge. (As Captain, repair and recruit a TC-280 Prototype.)
Hacks in order of nearest purchasable, this includes the nearest one part of a Multishop Terminal or Equipment Triple Shop
Upon hacking: Chests will be opened, Drones will be immediately bought, Shrine of Chance will attempt to buy an item and cost $0 for all remaining attempts, and Shrine of the Woods will have the first level bought and subsequent levels will cost $0
Does not activate interactables that are locked by the Teleporter Event (will only reduce their cost down to 0), or interactables that cost any currency other than coin, such as Lunar Coins

Commando.description: The Commando is a jack-of-all-trades character that is reliable in all situations of the game.
Commando.name: Commando

skills.name: Double Tap
skills.Description: Rapidly shoot an enemy for 100% damage.
skills.Notes:
Takes 0.4s with Attack Speed of 1.
Damage falloff starts at 25m and ends at 60m, falling to approximately 50% of the bullet's damage.

skills.name: Phase Round
skills.Description: Fire a piercing bullet for 300% damage. Deals 40% more damage every time it passes through an enemy.
skills.Notes: Can travel through terrain

skills.name: Phase Blast
skills.Description: Fire two close-range blasts that deal 8x200% damage total.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Commando: Rolling Thunder Challenge. (As Commando, land the killing blow on an Overloading Worm.)
Damage falloff starts at approximately 6m and ends at roughly 25m, falling to about 25% of the blast's damage.

skills.name: Tactical Dive
skills.Description: Roll a short distance.

skills.name: Tactical Slide
skills.Description: Slide on the ground for a short distance. You can fire while sliding.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Commando: Godspeed Challenge. (As Commando, fully charge the first-stage teleporter before the timer hits 5 minutes.)
If used in the air, it will act like an extra jump.

skills.name: Suppressive Fire
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Fire repeatedly for 100% damage per bullet. The number of shots increases with attack speed.
skills.Notes:
Fires more shots based on attack speed, with default six.
Damage falloff starts at 25m and ends at 60m, falling to approximately 50% of the bullet's damage.

skills.name: Frag Grenade
skills.Description: Throw a grenade that explodes for 700% damage. Can hold up to 2.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Commando: Incorruptible Challenge. (As Commando, clear 20 stages in a single run without picking up any Lunar items.)
The timer for the explosion begins after the first bounce and is 1 second long.

Engineer.description: The Engineer is a unique class that requires planning and positioning to be successful.
Engineer.name: Engineer

skills.name: Bouncing Grenades
skills.Description: Charge up to 8 grenades that deal 100% damage each.
skills.Notes: Can sprint while charging (start charging and then sprint, needs to be repeated for every attack)

skills.name: Pressure Mines
skills.Description: Place a two-stage mine that deals 300% damage, or 900% damage if fully armed. Can place up to 4.
skills.Notes:
Mines do not stick to allies or enemies, but do stick to Bubble Shield.
There's no damage falloff.
Detection radius is 7.5m when fully armed.

skills.name: Spider Mines
skills.Description: Place a robot mine that deals 600% damage when an enemy walks nearby. Can place up to 4.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Engineer: 100% Calculated Challenge. (As Engineer, defeat the teleporter boss in less than 5 seconds after it spawns.)
These mines have a greater range as they seek out enemies, and double the damage of the default mines if thrown directly onto enemies (or otherwise not allowed to arm), making this a good potential 'upgrade' for many players' playstyles

skills.name: Bubble Shield
skills.Description: Place an impenetrable shield that blocks all incoming damage.
skills.Notes:
Lasts for 10s
Can be estimated to cover a 9.75m radius.
Only one can be active at a time
Flashes before disappearing
Enemies can move inside the barrier, negating its effects
Anything can fire outwards from the shield, and nothing can fire through it inwards (including yourself).

skills.name: Thermal Harpoons
skills.Description: Enter target painting mode to launch heat-seeking harpoons that deal 500% damage each. Can store up to 4.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Engineer: Zero Sum Challenge. (As Engineer, finish charging the teleporter with zero monsters remaining on the stage.)
Press utility key to enter paint mode, M1 to paint targets
Harpoon recharge pauses while in paint mode
Holding down M1 allows allocation of up to 4 harpoons on 1-4 targets at a rate of 1 harpoon per .3 seconds.
Harpoons cannot be fired without a target
Fired harpoons that no longer have a target will redirect to the nearest target (it is possible to build up a swarm of harpoons by constantly firing at a single target when no other targets are within range)
If harpoons are canceled by M2, the number of charges painted onto targets will deplete, and fire no harpoons.

skills.name: TR12 Gauss Auto-Turret
skills.Description: Place a turret that inherits all your items. Fires a cannon for 100% damage. Can place up to 2.
skills.Notes:
Description clarification: Fires a cannon 3 times per second for 70% of the turret's damage, which is the same as 80% of the engineer's damage. A turret's items will use the turret's base damage to calculate damage.
The TR12 Gauss Auto-Turrets experience damage falloff, starting at roughly 25m and ending near 60m, falling to approximately 50% of their original damage per shot.

skills.name: TR58 Carbonizer Turret
skills.Description: Place a mobile turret that inherits all your items. Fires a laser for 200% damage per second that slows enemies. Can place up to 2.
skills.Notes: Unlocked via the Engineer: Better With Friends Challenge. (As Engineer, recruit 12 minions at one time.)

Heretic.description:
The Heretic is a powerful character who can only be accessed through extraordinary means. 

The Heretic cannot be selected from the character selection screen and must be transformed into by collecting all 4 Heresy items in a single run: Visions of Heresy, Hooks of Heresy, Essence of Heresy, and Strides of Heresy.
Heretic.name: Heretic

skills.name: Nevermore
skills.Description: Squawk a solemn reply.

skills.name: Hungering Gaze
skills.Cooldown: 2s (+2s per stack) since the last shot was fired
skills.Description: Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).
skills.Notes:
Changes the firing of Engineer's turrets.
Replaces both of MUL-T's selected primary skills.
Picking up an Ammo Box from a 
Bandolier
 will grant the full capacity.
Affected by 
Alien Head
.
Works well with 
Purity
.

skills.name: Slicing Maelstrom
skills.Description: Charge up a projectile that deals 175% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds. Recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds.
skills.Notes:
Each hit of the "slice" has a damage coefficient of 25%.
The blast has a radius of 14m.

skills.name: Shadowfade
skills.Description: Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 18.2% (+18.2% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.
skills.Notes:
Correction: The in-game description of healing for 25% of your max health is incorrect. Instead, it gives 1.3% max health per tick for 14 ticks, for a total of 18.2% max health in healing per stack.
Being in the air when activating the skill, or jumping, will allow the player to fly
Can not be canceled early
The player can still interact with things, but cannot use skills

skills.name: Ruin
skills.Description: Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.
skills.Notes:
Multiple enemies can be afflicted by Ruin simultaneously.
When the skill is activated, one shot is fired towards each enemy.
The shots penetrate walls.
Unable to add Ruin stacks while this ability is on cooldown.
Damaging enemies has a chance (100% * Proc Coefficient) to apply Ruin for the full 10 seconds.
Applying Ruin will reset the duration of current Ruin debuffs on the same enemy.
Bleeding, Drones, and other types of damage do not stack Ruin.

Huntress.description: The Huntress is an extremely mobile but fragile survivor with a high damage output.
Huntress.name: Huntress

skills.name: Strafe
skills.Description:
Agile
. Quickly fire a seeking arrow for 150% damage.
skills.Notes:
Fire Rate: 0.5s
Can only be used while locked onto an enemy. Huntress automatically locks onto enemies in front of her at a medium range.
Fires 1 arrow per attack. The arrow homes in on your locked target, ignoring terrain and cover.

skills.name: Flurry
skills.Description:
Agile
. Draw back a volley of 3 seeking arrows for 3x100% damage. Critical Strikes fire 6 arrows.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Huntress: Finishing Touch Challenge. (As Huntress, land a killing blow with every possible hit of a single glaive.)
Fire Rate: 1.3s
Can only be used while locked onto an enemy. Huntress automatically locks onto enemies in front of her at a medium range.
Fires 3 arrows per attack. These arrows all home in on your locked target, ignoring terrain and cover.
If you would Critically Hit, fires 6 arrows instead for a total of 600% base damage.
While Flurry is initially weaker than Strafe, this interaction makes it stronger with high Critical Strike chance. Flurry itself does 22% less damage than Strafe with no bonus crit chance, 2% more at 18% crit chance, and 54% more with full crit chance. For triggering on-hit items that do (don't) scale with total damage, Flurry is 46% (19%) weaker without crit, equal at 86% (24%) crit, and 7% (62%) stronger with full crit.

skills.name: Laser Glaive
skills.Description: Throw a seeking glaive that bounces up to 6 times for 250% damage. Damage increases by 10% per bounce.
skills.Notes:
Can only be used while locked onto an enemy. Huntress automatically locks onto enemies in front of her at a medium range.
The 10% damage increase per bounce is applied multiplicatively after the 250% base damage damage * 2.5 * 1.1 ^ bounces
This allows Laser Glaive to activate 
Runald's Band
 and 
Kjaro's Band
 on either of the last two hits.
Can travel through terrain

skills.name: Blink
skills.Description: Disappear and teleport forward.
skills.Notes:
Teleport a medium distance, that appears to scale with movement speed, in the direction you are facing the camera.
This includes teleporting straight up or down. Doing this you can avoid fall damage.

skills.name: Phase Blink
skills.Description:
Agile
. Disappear and teleport a short distance. Can store up to 3 charges.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Huntress: One Shot, One Kill Challenge. (As Huntress, collect and carry 12 Crowbars at once.)
Teleport a short distance, that appears to scale with movement speed, in the direction you are moving.
Unlike Blink, you cannot blink upwards or downwards, only horizontally.

skills.name: Arrow Rain
skills.Description: Teleport into the sky. Target an area to rain arrows, slowing all enemies and dealing 330% damage per second.
skills.Notes:
Correction: The in-game description of 225% damage per second is incorrect
Hits 19 times for 110% damage over 6s (2090% damage total)
Can struggle to hit airborne enemies as they cannot be directly targeted.

skills.name: Ballista
skills.Description: Teleport backwards into the sky. Fire up to 3 energy bolts, dealing 3x900% damage.
skills.Notes: Unlocked via the Huntress: Piercing Wind Challenge. (As Huntress, start and finish either Rallypoint Delta or Scorched Acres without falling below 100% health.)

Loader.description: The Loader is a slow but powerful bruiser that can use her grappling hook to uniquely navigate the environment.
Loader.name: Loader

skills.name: Scrap Barrier
skills.Description: The Loader is immune to fall damage. Striking enemies with the Loader's gauntlets grants a temporary barrier.
skills.Notes: This barrier gain is 5% of the max barrier.

skills.name: Knuckleboom
skills.Description: Swing at nearby enemies for 320% damage.

skills.name: Grapple Fist
skills.Description: Fire your gauntlet forward, pulling you to the target.
skills.Notes: This does not damage enemies.

skills.name: Spiked Fist
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Fire your gauntlet forward, dealing 320% damage. Pulls you to heavy targets. Light targets are pulled to YOU instead.
skills.Notes: Unlocked via the Loader: Swing By Challenge. (As Loader, reach and proceed through the Celestial Portal in 25 minutes or less.)

skills.name: Charged Gauntlet
skills.Description:
Heavy
. Charge up a piercing punch for 600%-2700% damage.
skills.Notes:
Can hold the charge.
Charges faster with attack speed.

skills.name: Thunder Gauntlet
skills.Description:
Heavy
. Charge up a single-target punch for 2100% damage that shocks enemies in a cone for 1000% damage.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Loader: Earthshatter Challenge. (As Loader, land a Charged Gauntlet hit at 300mph or higher.)
Cannot hold the charge.

skills.name: M551 Pylon
skills.Description: Throw a floating pylon that zaps up to 6 nearby enemies for 100% damage. Can be grappled.
skills.Notes:
Spawning multiple pylons through the use of other items (e.g. 
Brainstalks
, 
Bandolier
, or stacking 
Alien Head
) is possible but there is an internal cap of three that can be active at any time. Spawning more than three will have the oldest active pylon be removed when the new one spawns.
The pylon is inactive for 1.65 seconds after being used, and then zaps 14 times at 1-second intervals before despawning. All zaps over the duration crit together.
Does not attack faster with attack speed items.

skills.name: Thunderslam
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Slam your fists down, dealing 2000% damage on impact.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Loader: The Thunderdome Challenge. (As Loader, kill three other Loaders in the Bulwark's Ambry.)
The AOE is about the same size as the Hellfire Tincture

Mercenary.description: The Mercenary is a high skill melee survivor that uses his many dodges to weave in and out of combat.
Mercenary.name: Mercenary

skills.name: Cybernetic Enhancements
skills.Description: The Mercenary can jump twice.

skills.name: Laser Sword
skills.Description:
Agile
. Slice in front for 130% damage. Every 3rd hit strikes in a greater area and 
Exposes
 enemies.
skills.Notes:
The base swing speed is 0.42s per swing, with a 0.64s recovery window after the third swing which artificially reduces the base swing speed.
Any bonus attack speed will decrease the time spent in the recovery animation, but will not remove / negate it.

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.Description: Quickly slice horizontally twice, dealing 2x200% damage. If airborne, slice vertically instead.
skills.Notes: The animation speed is improved with attack speed, which also reduces the time taken to cast other skills.

skills.name: Rising Thunder
skills.Description: Unleash a slicing uppercut, dealing 450% damage and sending you airborne.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Mercenary: Demon of the Skies Challenge. (As Mercenary, don't touch the ground for 30 seconds.)
Correction: Rising Thunder actually does 550% damage.

skills.name: Blinding Assault
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Dash forward, dealing 300% damage. If you hit an enemy, you can dash again, up to 3 total.
skills.Notes:
The color of the icon will change depending on how many uses the skill has before going on cooldown; Blue for three, Yellow for two, Red for one.
The animation speed and total distance traveled is improved by attack speed bonuses.
The player has 2.66 seconds to use this ability again after striking an enemy (while a charge is available).
Focused Assault



Type	Utility
Cooldown	8s
Proc Coefficient	1
Description	
Stunning
. Dash forward, dealing 700% damage and Exposing enemies after 1 second.
Notes

Unlocked via the Mercenary: Flash of Blades Challenge. (As Mercenary, use 20 abilities in 10 seconds.)
After a 1 second delay, All enemies hit become Exposed

skills.name: Focused Assault
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Dash forward, dealing 700% damage and Exposing enemies after 1 second.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the Mercenary: Flash of Blades Challenge. (As Mercenary, use 20 abilities in 10 seconds.)
After a 1 second delay, All enemies hit become Exposed

skills.name: Eviscerate
skills.Description: Target the nearest enemy, attacking them for 110% damage repeatedly. You cannot be hit for the duration.
skills.Notes:
Lasts for 1.3s after casting.
Deals 7 damage ticks on cast, the amount of damage ticks is improved by attack speed without affecting its duration.
Invincible for 0.6s after Eviscerate ends.
Performs a dash and no other effects if it does not target an enemy.

skills.name: Slicing Winds
skills.Description:
Fire a wind of blades that attack up to 3 enemies for 8x100% damage. The last hit 
Exposes
 enemies.
skills.Notes: Unlocked via the Mercenary: Ethereal Challenge. (As Mercenary, complete a Prismatic Trial without falling below 100% health.)

MUL-T.description: MUL-T is an aggressive survivor who has the tools necessary for any job!
MUL-T.name: MUL-T

skills.name: Multifunctional
skills.Description: MUL-T can hold two equipment at once. The active equipment is swapped by using Retool.

skills.name: Auto-Nailgun
skills.Description: Rapidly fire nails for 70% damage. Finishes with a blast of 12 nails.
skills.Notes:
Fires 12 shots per second, for 840% damage per second.
Fires in a corkscrew pattern.
Needs 1.152s after releasing the fire button to cool down.
The final blast recoils a little.

skills.name: Rebar Puncher
skills.Description: Fire a piercing rebar that deals 600% damage.
skills.Notes: Base time between shots is 1.8s, for 333% damage per second.

skills.name: Scrap Launcher
skills.Description: Fire a rocket that explodes for 360% damage. Hold up to 4.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the MUL-T: Pest Control Challenge. (As MUL-T, defeat two Beetle Queens without leaving the teleporter zone.)
There is a 0.3 second delay after firing each shot before it is possible to fire again. This means it takes 0.9 seconds to fire all 4 shots at base attack speed, if ignoring the delay after the final shot.
All 4 shots are fired and reloaded every 1.5 seconds, for 960% damage per second.
The cooldown begins when the first shot is fired. Subsequent shots will not reset the cooldown. When the cooldown ends, all 4 shots are reloaded.
Enemies that are damaged by the AOE but are not hit by the projectile directly take 90% damage, or 1/4th of the shot's direct power.
Travels at 100m/s.
Explodes in a 7m radius.

skills.name: Power-Saw
skills.Description: Saw nearby enemies for 1000% damage per second.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the MUL-T: Gotcha! Challenge. (As MUL-T, land the killing blow on an Imp Overlord with the Preon Accumulator.)
Deals 100% damage 10 times per second.
Slightly pulls you forward whenever you hit a target.

skills.name: Blast Canister
skills.Description:
Stunning
. Launch a canister for 220% damage. Drops stun bomblets for 5x44% damage.

skills.name: Transport Mode
skills.Description:
Heavy
. Zoom forward, gaining 200 armor and 220% movement speed. Deals 250% damage to enemies.
skills.Notes:
Grants 200 Armor.
Grants up to 45% additional speed.
Bonus damage scales linearly with bonus movement speed, including the movement speed granted by Transport Mode.
You cannot ram a monster twice in one skill use.
Ramming into large enemies will halt the skill and deal an additional attack:
Deals four times the original damage (Including bonus damage from movement speed)
Stuns the target

skills.name: Retool
skills.Description: Passively hold TWO equipment at once. Activating 'Retool' switches the active Equipment and MUL-T's primary attack.
skills.Notes: Swapping takes 0.4s

skills.name: Power Mode
skills.Description: Enter a heavy stance, equipping both your primary attacks at once. Gain 200 armor, but lose -60% movement speed.
skills.Notes: Unlocked via the MUL-T: Seventh Day Challenge. (As MUL-T, clear the Void Fields on Stage 7 or later)

REX.description: REX is a half robot / half plant that uses HP to cast devastating skills from a distance. The plant nor the robot could survive this planet alone – but thankfully they have each other.
REX.name: REX

skills.name: Natural Toxins
skills.Description:
Certain attacks 
Weaken
 enemies hit, reducing their movement speed, armor, and damage.
skills.Notes:
Note: The in-game description of -20 armor is incorrect, it is actually -30 armor.
Lasts 3 seconds.

skills.name: DIRECTIVE: Inject
skills.Description:
Fire 3 syringes for 3x80% damage. The last syringe 
Weakens
 and heals for 60% of damage dealt.
skills.Notes:
Burst duration is 0.2 seconds and the animation duration is 0.6 seconds.
Each shot of the burst can crit independently.

skills.name: DIRECTIVE: Drill
skills.Description: Launch a series of seed bullets into the sky, raining down for 450% damage per second.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the REX: Bushwhacked Challenge. (As REX, complete an entire teleporter event while under 50% health.)
Hits 16 times for 90% damage over 3s (1440% damage total)

skills.name: Seed Barrage
skills.Description:
15% HP
. Launch a mortar into the sky for 450% damage.

skills.name: DIRECTIVE: Disperse
skills.Description:
Fire a 
Sonic Boom
 that 
Weakens
 all enemies hit.
skills.Notes: Pushing force varies depending on the size of the enemy, with bosses being pushed the least.

skills.name: Bramble Volley
skills.Description:
20% HP
. Fire a 
Sonic Boom
 that damages enemies for 550% damage. Heals for every target hit.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the REX: Dunked Challenge. (As REX, kill a Clay Dunestrider on Abandoned Aqueduct by throwing it into a pit.)
Heals REX for 10% of their max HP per target hit.

skills.name: DIRECTIVE: Harvest
skills.Description: Fire a bolt that deals 330% damage and injects an enemy. On death, drop multiple healing fruits that heal for 25% HP.
skills.Notes:
Unlocked via the REX: Full of Life challenge. (As REX, heal for 1000 health at once.)
The mark lasts 10 seconds before expiring.
Has a slight area of effect, so multiple enemies can become marked from a single cast.
Spawns 2 - 8 fruits (scales with enemy max HP) when the marked target is killed.
Only 1 enemy can be affected at any time. Using the ability on a different target removes the debuff on the previous enemy

skills.name: Tangling Growth
skills.Description:
25% HP
. Fire a flower that roots for 200% damage. Heals for every target hit.
skills.Notes:
Takes a full second to unfurl, then remains active for 8 seconds.
Heals REX for an estimated 1.5% of their max HP every second per snared target.
